doc.title: Andrea Doria '74
doc.plot: 'Andrea Doria-74' is a stunning documentary on a diving expedition to the sunken Italian ocean liner Andrea Doria. The Andrea Doria was sunk in a collision with the Swedish ocean liner Stockholm on July 25-26, 1956. Fifty-one people were killed in the accident. The sound track by Riz Ortolani is haunting.
